channel.title: How do i add bank booths and remove walls
channel.description:
how do i add bank booths and how do i remove walls?
im new, but i can do the coding if it isn't advanced shit
thank you

item.title: How do i add bank booths and remove walls
item.dc:creator: @jacked4fun1 jacked4fun1
item.description:
@jacked4fun1 wrote:

1.bank booth code[code] makeGlobalObject(x coord, y coord ,2213,0, 10);// bank booth

[/code]put that under the last globalobjects thing 0,1,2,3 are directions as shown above always keep the 10 at the end.
2.delete walls like this search public void deletewalls under the last one that has delete walls put this and change the symbols with the coords and all that good stuff deletethatwall(x coord, y coord); // item name is hereput that under another delete wall then right click the wall you want to the delete the look something like this wall 3456 2345,3475 u want the last 2 numbers and put that in x and y coords.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add bank booths and remove walls
